titleStmt.title: The peace of Jerusalem a sermon preached in the Parliament House, Jan. 9, 1656 : being a day of private humiliation kept by the members thereof / by Edward Reynolds.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Ratcliffe for George Thomason ...,

notesStmt.note: Item appears at reel 576:5 as seventh part of "Divers sermons preached upon several occasions" (R1245A).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
